verses.text: B'itejec ak' b'it t'a Jehová. Ilecnab' tas satub'tac ix sk'ulej. A' ix onh colan a onh schonhab' onh tik yet' yipalil axonhej ochi.
Ix sch'oxel scolval Jehová, ix sch'oxan yil juntzanh nivac nación to tojol syutej spactzitan t'a eb' ajk'ol yajoch t'ay.
Ix elnhejk'och tas ix yal t'ayonh a onh schonhab' Israel onh tik. Ix yak'cot swach'k'olal t'ayonh. Masanto t'a slajvub' yol yib'anhk’inal tik ix ilchaji to ix onh colchaj yuj co Diosal.
Ex cajan ex t'a masanil sat lu'um tik, b'itananhec t'a Jehová t'a tzalajk'olal. Hak'ek eyip e b'itan t'ay t'a tzalajk'olal.
B'itejec b'it t'a Jehová yet' te' arpa yet' te' ay sch'anhal.
B'itananhec t'a Jehová co Reyal t'a tzalajk'olal. B'itananhec, tze pu'an q'uen trompeta, tze pu'anpax nok' ch'aac.
B'itanocab' ha' mar yet' masanil nok' nok' ay t'a yol ha'. B'itanocab'pax yol yib'anhk’inal tik yet' eb' cajan t'ay.
k'anhocab' ha' nivac ha' yuj tzalajk'olal. Junlajanocab' tz'aj yavaj lum nivac vitz t'a tzalajk'olal t'a yichanh Jehová,
yujto ol javoc, ol ul yak'an Yajalil t'a yol yib'anhk’inal tik. A' ol ak'an Yajalil, junlajan ol yutoc sch'olb'itan juntzanh chonhab' t'a stojolal.
